result.ga: déan mar a deirtear leat
result.orig: déan mar a deirtear leat
result.html: déan mar a deirtear leatDo as you're told!
result.ponchtml: déan mar a deirtear leatDo as you're told!

result.html: dúirt mé an praghas leisI told him the price.
result.ponchtml: dúirt mé an praġas leisI told him the price.

result.html: dúirt mé léi imeachtI told her to leave.
result.ponchtml: dúirt mé léi imeaċtI told her to leave.

result.eng: I don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ga: ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.orig: ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.html: ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ponchtml: ní cuiṁin liom gaċ pioc den scéal aċ is cuiṁin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.

result.eng: She was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.
result.ga: dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtas
result.orig: dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtas
result.html: dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtasShe was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.
result.ponchtml: dúraḋ léi go mbeaḋ uirṫi €500 a íoc leis an rialtasShe was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.

result.eng: It's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ga: is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.orig: is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.html: is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ponchtml: is maiṫ a rinne tú an ḟírinne a inse agus ar a ẛon sin ní ḃainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
